name: HOOKASH
description:
A game made for the #TeamSeas Gamejam in just 2 days. It must have a lot of bugs, but I hope you enjoy it anyway.

GOAL:

Try to collect as much trash as possible in a minute so that the beach stays clean.

CONTROLS:
  • WASD to move
  • Left mouse button to shot your hook
  • Space to cancel the hookshot
  • F to collect Trash
